2. BnGBwYEPUeUGWrTekiDEuYTcvkFasNApony6dxeyXRKj
cash-usdc lp (withdowal from sunny when hacked)
https://solscan.io/tx/5ScUQD79xhFoHQozhYJQxv17jX4FEGC5nnCEa7d3kM5zBg9SXF5aiWR556K6pNLyxp9j3kG7XFGb2BPbmNdCdsJG
https://solscan.io/tx/4iMAzRxZsH7VNKLpFpC8xFpCBPtq7fwWhrmZGvZNaWxYtJr1dRa4VWkz89AN3pzVLqpC8ayjZTmSM89tqYftUF5z
3. 
4. 
5. 284267,48 usdc
6. Source of this money: I am solana validator and early supporter of solana, this money is rewards for participation in solana testnet (Tour de Sol program).
Why you need it back: I am russian citizen and I just fled the country when the Putin regime unleashed a war in Ukraine.
I support Ukrainian refugees and I have a residence permit in a country that the Russian regime considers an "unfriendly country", 
so I cannot sell my property in Russia (there is a law in Russia forbidding me to do this) to buy a property in a new country. 
I was going to buy housing with these funds and counted on them for my family (there are four of us: me, my wife, a daughter of 5 years old and a pug), 
in addition, I am going to evacuate my old parents from Russia, who also find it hard to be there. 
This hack happened at a very bad time, I hope you will return at least part of it.
source:
Source of this money: I am solana validator and early supporter of solana, this money is rewards for participation in solana testnet (Tour de Sol program).
Why you need it back: I am russian citizen and I just fled the country when the Putin regime unleashed a war in Ukraine.
I support Ukrainian refugees and I have a residence permit in a country that the Russian regime considers an "unfriendly country", 
so I cannot sell my property in Russia (there is a law in Russia forbidding me to do this) to buy a property in a new country. 
I was going to buy housing with these funds and counted on them for my family (there are four of us: me, my wife, a daughter of 5 years old and a pug), 
in addition, I am going to evacuate my old parents from Russia, who also find it hard to be there. 
This hack happened at a very bad time, I hope you will return at least part of it.
